pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to X12-ARIMA/X13-ARIMA-SEATS and Structure for Batch Processing of Seasonal Adjustment // The X13-ARIMA-SEATS methodology and software is a widely used software and developed by the US Census Bureau. It can be accessed from R with this R package and X13-ARIMA-SEATS binaries are provided by the R package x13binary.
